verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Thou and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> and thy fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%> with thee shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>; and thou and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with thee shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of your priesthood <S%H3550><s%>.

And thy brethren <S%H251><s%> also <S%H4294><s%>, the tribe of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of thy father <S%H1><s%>, bring <S%H7126><s%> thou near with thee <S%H3867><s%>, that they may be joined unto thee <S%H8334><s%>, and minister unto thee <S%H1121><s%>: but thou and thy sons with thee shall be before <S%H6440><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>.

And they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> thy charge <S%H4931><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of all the Tent <S%H168><s%>: only they shall not come nigh <S%H7126><s%> unto the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>, that they die not <S%H4191><s%>, neither they, nor ye.

And they shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> unto thee <S%H8104><s%>, and keep the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, for all the service <S%H5656><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%>: and a stranger <S%H2114><s%> shall not come nigh unto you <S%H7126><s%>.

And ye shall keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>; that there be wrath <S%H7110><s%> no more upon the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And I <S%H3947><s%>, behold, I have taken your brethren <S%H251><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: to you they are a gift <S%H4979><s%>, given <S%H5414><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And thou and thy sons <S%H1121><s%> with thee shall keep <S%H8104><s%> your priesthood <S%H3550><s%> for everything <S%H1697><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and for that within <S%H1004><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%>; and ye shall serve <S%H5647><s%>: I give <S%H5414><s%> you the priesthood <S%H3550><s%> as a service <S%H5656><s%> of gift <S%H4979><s%>: and the stranger <S%H2114><s%> that cometh nigh <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death <S%H4191><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, And I <S%H5414><s%>, behold, I have given thee the charge <S%H4931><s%> of my heave-offerings <S%H8641><s%>, even all the hallowed things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; unto thee have I given <S%H5414><s%> them by reason of the anointing <S%H4888><s%>, and to thy sons <S%H1121><s%>, as a portion <S%H2706><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.

This shall be thine of the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>, reserved from the fire <S%H784><s%>: every oblation <S%H7133><s%> of theirs <S%H4503><s%>, even every meal-offering of theirs <S%H4503><s%>, and every sin-offering of theirs <S%H817><s%>, and every trespass-offering of theirs <S%H7725><s%>, which they shall render unto me <S%H6944><s%>, shall be most holy <S%H6944><s%> for thee and for thy sons <S%H1121><s%>.
As the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> things shalt thou eat <S%H398><s%> thereof <S%H2145><s%>; every male shall eat <S%H398><s%> thereof <S%H6944><s%>: it shall be holy unto thee.

And this is thine <S%H8641><s%>: the heave-offering of their gift <S%H4976><s%>, even all the wave-offerings <S%H8573><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; I have given <S%H5414><s%> them unto thee <S%H1121><s%>, and to thy sons and to thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> with thee <S%H2706><s%>, as a portion for ever <S%H5769><s%>; every one that is clean <S%H2889><s%> in thy house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat thereof <S%H398><s%>.

All the best <S%H2459><s%> of the oil <S%H3323><s%>, and all the best <S%H2459><s%> of the vintage <S%H8492><s%>, and of the grain <S%H1715><s%>, the first-fruits <S%H7225><s%> of them which they give <S%H5414><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to thee have I given them <S%H5414><s%>.

The first-ripe <S%H1061><s%> fruits of all that is in their land <S%H776><s%>, which they bring <S%H935><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, shall be thine <S%H2889><s%>; every one that is clean in thy house <S%H1004><s%> shall eat thereof <S%H398><s%>.
Everything devoted <S%H2764><s%> in Israel shall be thine <S%H3478><s%>.

Everything that openeth <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%>, of all flesh <S%H1320><s%> which they offer <S%H7126><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, both of man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> shall be thine <S%H1060><s%>: nevertheless the first-born of man <S%H120><s%> shalt thou surely <S%H6299><s%> redeem <S%H6299><s%>, and the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of unclean <S%H2931><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%> shalt thou redeem <S%H6299><s%>.

And those that are to be redeemed <S%H6299><s%> of them from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou redeem <S%H6299><s%>, according to thine estimation <S%H6187><s%>, for the money <S%H3701><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%>, after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> (the same is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>).

But the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a cow <S%H7794><s%>, or the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a sheep <S%H3775><s%>, or the firstling <S%H1060><s%> of a goat <S%H5795><s%>, thou shalt not redeem <S%H6299><s%>; they are holy <S%H6944><s%>: thou shalt sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> their blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and shalt burn <S%H6999><s%> their fat <S%H2459><s%> for an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%>, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> savor <S%H7381><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> of them shall be thine <S%H8573><s%>, as the wave - breast <S%H2373><s%> and as the right <S%H3225><s%> thigh <S%H7785><s%>, it shall be thine.

All the heave-offerings <S%H8641><s%> of the holy things <S%H6944><s%>, which the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> offer <S%H7311><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, have I given <S%H5414><s%> thee <S%H1121><s%>, and thy sons and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> with thee <S%H2706><s%>, as a portion for ever <S%H5769><s%>: it is a covenant <S%H1285><s%> of salt <S%H4417><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> unto thee and to thy seed with thee <S%H2233><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, Thou shalt have no inheritance <S%H5157><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>, neither shalt thou have any portion <S%H2506><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them <S%H2506><s%>: I am thy portion and thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, behold <S%H5414><s%>, I have given all the tithe in Israel <S%H3478><s%> for <S%H2500><s%> an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, in return for <S%H2500><s%> their service <S%H5656><s%> which they serve <S%H5647><s%>, even the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And henceforth <S%H5750><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall not come nigh <S%H7126><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, lest they bear <S%H5375><s%> sin <S%H2399><s%>, and die <S%H4191><s%>.

But the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> their iniquity <S%H5771><s%>: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%>; and among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> they shall have <S%H5157><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.

For the tithe <S%H4643><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, which they offer <S%H7311><s%> as a heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the Levites <S%H3881><s%> for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: therefore I have said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8432><s%>, Among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> they shall have <S%H5157><s%> no inheritance <S%H5159><s%>.
And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Moreover thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3947><s%>, When ye take of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the tithe <S%H4643><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> you from them for your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, then ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> up a heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> of it for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, a tithe <S%H4643><s%> of the tithe <S%H4643><s%>.

And your heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> shall be reckoned <S%H2803><s%> unto you <S%H1715><s%>, as though it were the grain of the threshing-floor <S%H1637><s%>, and as the fulness <S%H4395><s%> of the winepress <S%H3342><s%>.

Thus ye also shall offer <S%H7311><s%> a heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> of all your tithes <S%H4643><s%>, which ye receive <S%H3947><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and thereof ye shall give <S%H5414><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

Out of all your gifts <S%H4979><s%> ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> every heave-offering <S%H8641><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, of all the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof <S%H4720><s%>, even the hallowed part thereof out of it.

Therefore thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H7311><s%>, When ye heave the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof from it <S%H2803><s%>, then it shall be reckoned unto the Levites <S%H3881><s%> as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the threshing-floor <S%H1637><s%>, and as the increase <S%H8393><s%> of the wine-press <S%H3342><s%>.

And ye shall eat <S%H398><s%> it in every place <S%H4725><s%>, ye and your households <S%H1004><s%>: for it is your reward <S%H7939><s%> in return for <S%H2500><s%> your service <S%H5656><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.

And ye shall bear <S%H5375><s%> no sin <S%H2399><s%> by reason of it <S%H7311><s%>, when ye have heaved from it the best <S%H2459><s%> thereof <S%H2490><s%>: and ye shall not profane the holy things <S%H6944><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that ye die not <S%H4191><s%>.
